segments.text: I find myself admiring the children’s teamwork, despite the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s focus is entirely on that cookie jar, a plate clutched in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really committed to this venture, stretching every muscle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister below is the perfect accomplice, ready to receive the goods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her palm is open, her eyes fixed on the jar, full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're like a well-oiled machine, completely in sync for their sugary prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's genuinely impressive how stealthy and determined they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To think they’re doing this while their guardian is just a few feet away, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The image of them working together for cookies brings a smile to my face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely pushing their luck, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies without any tumbles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What clever little rascals they are.
segments.speaker: PAR
